issue.title: [C++][Compute] Benchmark element wise min,max
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15740](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15740). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
PR <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12338> tries to optimize element wise min/max for binary inputs. We should create a benchmark first.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15740?focusedCommentId=17496138) by David Li (lidavidm):*
